effect.ruby-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down. This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
effect.emerald: Inflicts regular damage. If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down. This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
effect.firered-leafgreen: Inflicts regular damage. If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down. This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
effect.colosseum: Inflicts regular damage. If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down. This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down. This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

short_effect.ruby-sapphire: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.emerald: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.firered-leafgreen: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.colosseum: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.xd: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A strong jumping kick. May miss and hurt the kicker.
flavor_text.emerald: A strong jumping kick. May miss and hurt the kicker.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The user jumps up high, then kicks. If it misses, the user hurts itself.
